snippet: Artist Hemali Bhuta, one of the “most intriguing cultural voices” to emerge from India today.
abstract: Artist Hemali Bhuta, one of the “most intriguing cultural voices” to emerge from India today.
lead_paragraph: “One of the more intriguing cultural voices to emerge from a generation brought up in an increasingly global and ascendant India is the contemporary artist Hemali Bhuta,” Gayatri Rangachari Shah wrote in the Arts section of The New York Times.

headline.main: New Indian Art Star Evokes Space With Sculptures
